Active Skill.Name: Entangling Snakes
Active Skill.Description: Inflicts Magical Damage (Damage Rate 153%/174%/195%/216%/237%/258%/279%/300%) to all enemies, and reduces the dealt Magical Damage of 2 enemy targets with the highest Magical Attack by 17.9%/20.3%/22.8%/25.2%/27.7%/30.1%/32.6%/35% for 6 seconds.
